name: Mechtobacillus - Mechjam III
description:
This game is the third in a sequence of jam games. You surely can play this game alone, but if you want to understand the plot - which I recommend - please play at least the first one before playing this.

The other two games are:

Warthunder Type H - https://madparrot.itch.io/warthunderth-gwj36Please play this one first if you can. It's free and very short. Mechtobacillus makes references to it.

Access H - https://madparrot.itch.io/access-h7-gwj
No need to play this one first, but is also free and short and part of the canon.

---------------------------------

Mechtobacillus takes place a few years before the events happening in Warthunder Type H, and helps you understand a bit of how things ended up like that.

Control a mecha vehicle in a stealth mission to pick a very important object from a highly secured facility! No weapons, no combat: just sneaky infiltration. Avoid surveillance and get everything done without being noticed!

Game made for the Mechjam III, with all optional secondary themes used.
